"We do not choose when to rest. To give up the hard road is to bring suffering to the next traveler."

— Master Ahram

Home » TES Game Books » all Elder Scrolls games

The books from all Elder Scrolls games

  • By author
  • By category
  • By title
This section contains the books, letters and notes from all Elder Scrolls games.
  • "Death" of Morphotypical Entities - Doctor Rhythandius
    A study on Daedric death
  • ...ine Commands of the Eight Divines - Marisse
    Disappointment in the gods
  • 101 Uses for Troll Fat - Anonymous
    An angry merchant's letter listing the many virtues of troll fat
  • 16 Accords of Madness - Anonymous
    Stories of Sheogorath's interactions with mortals.
  • 2920, Last Year of the First Era - Carlovac Townway
    A fascinating drama taking place at the very end of the First Era.
  • 36 Lessons of Vivec - Vivec
    The complete series of 36 sermons. Very Michael Kirkbride - obscure and fascinating.
  • A Betrayal of Our Heritage - Nworc at-Traeh
    A denouncement of a Crown-Forebear marriage
  • A Bloody Journal - Viranus Donton
    The journal of Vilena Donton's son, found near his corpse. Note that there is a mistake in the text: over at the Loredas entry, "Viranus" should be "Vitellus".
  • A Boon for the Tribe - Lorhiel
    A bosmer tracker hopes for success in the Great Hunt
  • A Bound Dremora - Anonymous
  • A Brief History of Ald Sotha - Varlinsi Arandu
    Insights on the relationship between Sotha Sil and Vivec, plus a bit about House Sotha and its downfall
  • A Brief History of the Empire - Stronach
    A nice account, covers the whole 3rd Era, from the conquests of Tiber Septim to the reign of Uriel VII. Retells the storyline of TES: Arena. The composition and the tone of this work reminded me of "Annals of Kings and Rulers".
  • A Brief History of the Empire - Stronach k'Thojj III, Imperial Historian
    The classic book series that gives a quick summary of the Septim line throughout the 3rd Era. It differs slightly from the Daggerfall version.
  • A Brother's Gifts - Anonymous
    Buyer beware of baby echatere
  • A Brother's Plea - Hjarkborn
  • A Call for Common Hair - Anonymous
    An ancient pamphlet decrying Prince Hubalajad's fancy hairdressing
  • A Call to Action! - Scribe Nicolard
    Bounty on Goblins
  • A Call to the Worthy - Anonymous
    An invitation for s dangerous task
  • A Case for Open Borders - Kinlord Andurion
    A kinlord explains how he came to support Ayrenn's decree to open Summerset, and urged others to do the same
  • A Cat's Serenade - Anonymous
  • A Child's Play - Anonymous
  • A Child's Tamriel Bestiary - Shane gro-Orath
    A children's rhyme of the alphabet
  • A Child's Tamriel Bestiary [French] - Shane gro-Orath
    The French translation of this rhyme book, featuring some new animals.
  • A Child's Tamriel Bestiary [German] - Shane gro-Orath
    The German translation of this rhyme book, featuring some new animals.
  • A Children's Anuad - Anonymous
    A version of the creation myth, featuring two brother's love for the same woman.
  • A Citizen's Petition - Adan Kordrel
    A letter addressed to the Blackcaster Mages Guild regarding a missing person
  • A Clothier's Primer - The Shattered Masque
    A beginner's guidebook to crafting reliable footwear
  • A Compilation of Redguard History - Anonymous
    This is another version of Redguards, Their History and Their Heroes.
  • A Complaint to the Thalmor - Anonymous
  • A Culinary Adventure - Rallaume Lemonds, Culinary Crusader
    A human connoisseur of exotic foods bites off more than he can chew in Black Marsh
  • A Cure for Lycanthropy - Archivist Ernarde of the Silver Dawn
    The search for a cure takes a desperate turn
  • A Cyrodilic Merchant's Lament - Anonymous
  • A Dance in Fire - Waughin Jarth
    This series of books retells Decumus Scotti's adventures in Valenwood during the 5 years war between it and Elsweyr.
  • A Dance in Moonlight - Anonymous
    A Khajiiti myth about stealing moonlight
  • A Daughter's Journal - Anonymous
  • A Death Desired - Sorexius Cinna
  • A Diet of Eyes - Anonymous
  • A Discarded Letter - "D"
    A personal letter promising romance and riches
  • A Discarded Missive - Anonymous
    Congregation instructions for a secret society
  • A Distracted Enemy - Anonymous
    Brief missive on a chaotic creature
  • A Dragonhorn! Oh, Dragonhorn! - Adept Izjadi
    Verse about the Akaviri dragon hunters
  • A Dream of Sovngarde - Skardan Free-Winter
    A Nord's premature visit to Sovngarde.
  • A Dubious Tale of the Crystal Tower - Bibenus Geon
    An eons old joke about an actor who was hired by a Zoo.
  • A Dying Man's Last Words - Indie
    The last words of a world-renowned archaeologist.
  • A Fair Warning - Cumanya
    Fair warning to those who would enter the Greater Cavern of Dubdilla- don't!
  • A Final Appeal - Anonymous
    Plea for help against a Daedric prince
  • A Fitting Tribute - Anonymous
    A sinister and inhumane plot
  • A Folk Tale - Anonymous
    A local folk tale from Valenwood
  • A Forebear Warrior's Song - Anonymous
    A battle balad
  • A Fortune Behind Those Walls - Anonymous
    Something surely was behind those walls
  • A Fourth Scrap of Parchment - Anonymous
    A brief and intriguing rumination
  • A Free Argonian's Manifesto - Anonymous
    A personal outcry against slavery
  • A Game at Dinner - Anonymous
    A published letter from an anonymous spy about the game Prince Helseth cleverly played at the dinner between him and his Councilors.
  • A Gentleman's Guide to Whiterun - Mikael the Bard
    A guide to Whiterun and its ladies.
  • A Gift of Sanctuary - Anonymous
    A boy and his animal friend build a magical palace
  • A Gold Coast Children's Bestiary - Anonymous
    A playful (and terrifying) list if Gold Coast creatures
  • A Grand Transformation - Tree-Minder Hleelieek
    Explains an Argonian ceremony for changing one's gender
  • A Grifter's Apology - Anonymous
    How to avoid being swindled at the market place
  • A Guide to Dwemer Mega-Structures - Vorinara Kleeve
  • A Guide to Fishing Tamriel - "The Old Slaughterfish"
    A description of Tamrielic fish and how to hook them
  • A Guide to Gathering Frogs - Anonymous
    How, and where, to catch certain frog species
  • A Guide to Liturgical Vestments - High Ordinator Vermethys
    How to put on and wear Ordinator armor
  • A Hero's Weapon - Lizabet Delrusc
    A rather biased, glowing description of Greatsword usage
  • A History of Blackrose Prison - Tyrrya Len
    A history of this famous prison, and a bit about the crime syndicate that currently occupies it
  • A History of Daggerfall - Odiva Gallwood
    A surprisingly unbiased overview of Daggerfalll, and the Iliac Bay area in general.
  • A History of Lilmoth - Tyrrya Len
    History and current state of Black Marsh's southernmost port
  • A Hypothetical Treachery - Anthil Morvir
    An amusing play about a bunch of backstabbing adventurers.
  • A Hypothetical Treachery, part 1 - Anthil Morvir
    An amusing play about a bunch of backstabbing adventurers
  • A Hypothetical Treachery, part 2 - Anthil Morvir
    The exciting conclusion of this evening's production
  • A Kiss, Sweet Mother - Anonymous
    Procedures for preforming the Black Sacrament to summon the Dark Brotherhood.
  • A Leaflet - Anonymous
    Propaganda against the alchemist Aurane Frernis.
  • A Less Rude Song - Anonymous
    And you thought Dark Elves were prudes.
  • A Letter Home - Swallows-Cats-Whole
  • A Letter to Maraya - Almandine
    A duke's wife writers to her sister
  • A Letter to the Mayor - Anonymous
  • A Life Barbaric and Brutal - Arthenice Belloq
    A firsthand account of life among the Reachmen
  • A Life of Strife and Struggle - King Laloriaran Dynar
    Outlines for the Last Ayleid King's memoirs
  • A Light on the Moor - Anonymous
    A cautionary tale about the mists of Glenumbral
  • A Looter's Paradise - Silver-Haired Shadow
    A lucrative opportunity for a looter
  • A Memory Book - Fa-Nuit-Hen
    Memories of various Barons Who Move Like --
  • A Merchant's Guide to Valenwood - Anonymous
    Advice for merchants operating in Valenwood
  • A Merchant's Orders to His Guards - Anonymous
    A threatening letter warning never to mention what happened at Zalgaz's Den
  • A Midnight Ambush - Anonymous
    A brief summary of an ambush
  • A Minor Maze - Anonymous
    The history of Labyrinthian and its creator, Shalidor.
  • A Moment of Your Time? - Stibbons, Manservant
    A trip to a dark place goes about as well as you'd assume
  • A Mother's Nursery Rhyme - Anonymous
    A sad rhyme likely common among Argonians
  • A Nagging Question - Anonymous
    Just where are those guys and gals?
  • A Nereid Stole My Husband - Anonymous
    A song about the temptation of Nereids
  • A New Recipe? - Anonymous
    A new use for a very old and unlikely ingredient
  • A Nixad Made Me Do It - Anonymous
    A girl blames a nixiad for being mean to her sister
  • A Note - Anonymous
    Instructions.
  • A Note - Anonymous
    A note between grave robbers
  • A One-Time Offer - Avus
    A threat from the Camonna Tong
  • A Perfect Score - Hundred-Scales
    A lucrative deal in a haunted locale. What could go wrong?
  • A Petition for the Mighty Nix-Ox - Anonymous
    Farming is hard work for these gentle creatures, and they deserve a happy end
  • A Plea for Help - Darien Gautier
    A letter from a friend long thought dead
  • A Plea for the Elder Scrolls (Covenant version) - Moth Priest Crassius Viria
    The Covenant has the Elder Scroll!
  • A Plea for the Elder Scrolls (Dominion version) - Moth Priest Crassius Viria
    The Aldmeri Dominion has the scroll!
  • A Plea for the Elder Scrolls (Pact version) - Moth Priest Crassius Viria
    The Ebonheart Pact has the scroll!
  • A Plea for Vengeance - Anonymous
    Camlorn meets a dark fate
  • A Plea in Parting - Anonymous
    A brief plea
  • A Pocket Guide to Mournhold - Anonymous
    A brief overview of Mournhold's attractions
  • A Poorly Scrawled Note - Anonymous
    The story of a pathetic troll.
  • A Prayer for My Family - Ruthri Othrenim
    A sincere prayer
  • A Prayer to the Serpent - Anonymous
    Invocation of Satakal
  • A Prisoner's Journal - Anonymous
    A Prisoner in Oblivion slowly loses sanity
  • A Promise Made - Gasparien
    A letter between Vaermina cultists
  • A Prophesy - Anonymous
    A brief and cryptic prophecy
  • A Ragged Inscription - Cirithor
  • A Recipe of Surpassing Danger - Anonymous
    An unusual recipe requiring rare ingredients
  • A Rejection of Open Borders - Kinlady Avinisse of Shimmerene
    A kinlady explains how Altmeri racial superiority calls for isolation
  • A Reminder from the Judge - Judge Xiven
    Procedure for Daedric court
  • A Request for Relief - Defessus Magister
    A lamentation on the state of Enchanting
  • A Request for Your Support - Magistrix Vox
    A plot against ALMSIVI
  • A Request to Meet - Staada
    A request for a certain Daedric artifact
  • A Royal Embarrassment - Aemilianus Falto
    A pro-Imperial pamphlet bashing the Covenant leadership
  • A Rumor of Serpents - Scout Zagula
    A Report for the Dragonstar Caravan Company Proctor
  • A Sacrament Remains - Nazala
    A Dark Brotherhood assassin travels throughout Elsweyr looking for her target
  • A Sad Day for the Ra Gada - Anonymous
    Lamentations of a betrayed Forebear
  • A Sailor's Guide to Sea Elves - Virillda of the Silver-Sails
  • A Scholar's Guide to Nymphs - Vondham Barres
    How a nymph made a scholar abandon his scholarly ways.
  • A Scrap of Parchment - Anonymous
  • A Scrawled Note - Vulpriss Denisson
    Another "last words" type of note.
  • A Scrawled Note - Anonymous
    Concerns Azura's Star
  • A Scroll Written in Blood - Malaki the Lightfooted
    Yet another "last words" note. This note does contain a cute inside joke from Redguard, though.
  • A Second Scrap of Parchment - Anonymous
  • A Shallow Pool - Anonymous
    Just like a pair of boots, it's harder than it seems
  • A Short History of Morrowind - Jeanette Sitte
    A history book about Morrowind, mostly containing information about the settlements of the Vvardenfell district.
  • A Short History of The Augmented Craftworks - Anonymous
    A list of augmented weapons and their effects. Mostly a gameplay guide.
  • A Simple Prayer - Anonymous
    unfinished prayer
  • A Sister's Regret - Ruelde
  • A Sister's Retort - Ruelde
  • A Sky of Dusk - Romien Garvette
    A worshiper of Nocturnal visits her realm
  • A Smuggler's Plan - Anonymous
    Something about this plan does not smell right
  • A Soldier's Letter - Duqaq af-Wazif
    One Covenant soldier's view of what the war is really about
  • A Star Walks In Craglorn - Adandora the Tale-weaver
    A Tale of Romance and Adventure
  • A Star-Gazer's Ramblings - Anonymous
    Musings on an ancient warrior
  • A Study of Fabricants - Endilaril
    An examination of different sorts of Fabricant
  • A Subtler Brew - Anonymous
    Trying hard for the perfect liquor
  • A Summons of Heroes! - Anonymous
    Join the Companions!
  • A Tale Forever Told - Anonymous
    A tale of the legendary marriage of the Silvenar and Green Lady
  • A Tale of Baar Dau - Amili Drals
    How, and why, Vivec stopped the moonlet
  • A Tale of Kieran - Vegepythicus, editor
  • A Tally of Villagers - Anonymous
    Sinister plot for the people of Narsis
  • A Third Scrap of Parchment - Anonymous
  • A Time of Troubles - Gwilgoth Branchbreaker
    A scrap of a journal from a would-be treethane about loyalty.
  • A Token of My Affection - Anonymous
  • A Tough Audience - Sempronia
    A plan to trade with Trolls. Surely it will go well.
  • A Tragedy in Black - Anonymous
    A folk tale about black soulgems.
  • A Traveler's Guide to New Sheoth and the Shivering Isles - Brenith Aralyn
    Guide to New Sheoth and the surrounding area.
  • A Treatise on Proper Calcinator Use - Anonymous
    A handbook of Alchemy explaining the proper way to use a calcinator.
  • A Treatise on the Knot - Anonymous
    A brief guide on the reliable knot
  • A Warning - Vex
    No peeking!
  • A Warning and an Offer - Aralyon the Scholar
    This cave is occupied!
  • A Warning from Zimmeron - Zimmeron
    Zimmeron doesn't need or want your opinion
  • A Warning to the Aldmeri Dominion - Erystera Ligen
    A stern warning
  • A Way Out - Anonymous
    Jailbreak Hints
  • A Wealth of Raw Material - Grivier Bloodcaller
    The motherlode for the aspiring necromancer
  • A Werewolf Hunter's Advice - Anonymous
    Cautionary advice on hunting werewolves
  • A Werewolf's Confession - Captain Philmont of the Oldgate Lancers, Daggerfall Covenant Army
    A chilling confession of a moon stalker
  • A Window for Escape - Anonymous
  • A Word to the Wise - H
  • A World of Corpses - Mannimarco
    The Worm King's advice on finding corpses
  • A Worn and Weathered Note - Anonymous
    Beautiful and poetic prose. A tragedy for certain; anything more is hard to decipher.
  • Abah's Landing Merchant Lords - Tamonir
    A roster of the corupt mafia-nobility of Abah's Landing
  • ABCs for Barbarians - Anonymous
    Very nice book, strongly recommended for all barbarians.
  • Aberrant Welkynd Stones - Anonymous
    Frustration with Welkynd Stones
  • Abnur Tharn's Letter to the Player - Anonymous
    A letter, sent in real life, to promote the release of Elder Scrolls Online: Season of the Dragon
  • About Mercy - Gruznak
    A letter condemning mercy
  • About the Boss - Anonymous
    The Boss just has to go
  • Academy Supplies - Anonymous
    List of supplies for students of the Shad Astula
  • Academy's Rejection Letter - Felicitas Mallicius
    A scathing rejecting letter
  • According to Plan - Anonymous
  • Achieving Harmony with Death - Ymirra
  • Acolyte's Chipped Scroll Plate - Anonymous
  • Acolyte's Lost Scroll Plate - Anonymous
  • Acolyte's Scorched Scroll Plate - Anonymous
  • Acts of Honoring - Nisswo Xeewulm
    Poem honoring sithis
  • Adainaz's Journal - Adainaz
    A khajiit struggles to deactivate a dangerous device
  • Adeber's Journal - Adeber's Journal
    An auger observes crows and recieves a portent
  • Admission Denied - Evoker-Adept Carusian
    Money can't but your magehood
  • Admonition Against Ebony - Anonymous
    A warning about a sword.
  • Adril's Survey Results - Adril Arano
    Summary of the situation in Solstheim
  • Advances in Lock Picking - Anonymous
    Information on lockpicking and lock design.
  • Adventurer's Almanac, 1st Edition - Skordo the Knife
    The basics of Elder Scrolls Online's gameplay, told from an in-universe perspective
  • Adventurer's Almanac, 2nd Edition - Skordo the Knife
  • Adventurer's Almanac, 3rd Edition - Skordo the Knife
    DLC advertisement in the form of work leads for adventurers
  • Adventurer's Journal - Anonymous
    Description of mysterious caravan attack.
  • Adventurers Wanted! - Anonymous
  • Aedra and Daedra - Anonymous
    A brief overview of the differences between the two.
  • Aera's Household Notes - Aera
    A list of things Aera needs to do and get
  • Aera's Letter to Denskar - Aera
    Aera regrets the past and has hopes for the future
  • Aera's Letter to Tryn - Aera
    Aera hopes Tryn can forgive her
  • Aeri's Note - Aeri
    A letter to Jarl Skald concerning lumber and soldiers.
  • Aesrael's Journal - Aesrael
    A bandit reminiscing about his past
  • Aetherial Fragments - Lady Cinnabar of Taneth
    An overview of Skyshards and other meteoric glass
  • Aevar Stone-Singer - Anonymous
    A Skaal legend of a boy who returns the gifts of the All-Maker from the Greedy Man
  • Afflicted's Note - Anonymous
    Orchendor and the Dwemer machinery.
  • Against False Gods - Anonymous
    The Maulborn plan a spiritual mutiny
  • Against the Snakes - Denskar
    A very opinionated take on the Second Akaviri invasion
  • Agganor's Journal - Shaman Agganor
    An orc betrays his people for power within the Scaled Court
  • Agganor’s Journal - Shaman Agganor
    A young shaman takes advantage of the Scaled Court to rise in rank
  • Agnar's Journal - Agnar the Unwavering
    Journal of Agnar, chieftain of Thirsk after the departure of the Nerevarine.
  • Agolas' Journal - Agolas
    Clues to a worthless hidden treasure
  • Agra Crun - Anonymous
    How shield-wife Bagrar earned her moniker
  • Agrius's Journal - Agrius
    The corrupting influence of a certain cave.
  • Ahzidal's Descent - Halund Greycloak
    The legend of a Nord mage who trained among elves so he could have his revenge on them.
  • Ahzirr Trajijazaeri - Anonymous
    The philosophy of the Renrijra Krin, a group of Khajiiti revolutionaries.
  • Aicaano's Journal - Aicaano
    Hackdirt's "final" days
  • Aicantar's Lab Journal - Aicantar
    Aicantar's experiments on a spider centurion.
  • Airship Captain's Journal - Captain Roberto Jodoin
    A journal of ill-fated airship. It crashed in the northern region of Solstheim.
  • Akaviri Diary - Xhaferi
    The diary of a poor Akaviri courier. Official translation included.
  • Albus' Journal - Albus, White Rose Prison Guard
    A frustrating place for a prison
  • Alchemist Nilyne's Notes - Nilyne
    Record Of Llodos Plague
  • Alchemist's Journal - Anonymous
    An alchemist's musings about her new work area.
  • Alchemist's Note - Froda
    An ancient note concerning poisons and valiant death.
  • Alchemy For My Apprentice - You Know Who
    A master alchemist instructs an apprentice on the basics of potion-making
  • Alchemy Practicum - Defessus Lector
    A frustratingly inept alchemy student frustrates the instructer
  • Alchemy Report - Anonymous
    Potions used for a dishonest purpose
  • Alchemy Workshop Instructions - Anonymous
    A plot by the Maulborn to accelerate the plauge
  • Alchemy: Discovering Traits - Defessus Lector
    Bardus is up to his old habits
  • Aldepius's Confession - Aldepius
    A bandit's confession and a challenge
  • Aldimion's Journal - Aldimion
    A deranged person's journal
  • Aldmeri Court Transcript - Seventh Court of Aldmeri Justice
    A Thalmor document outlining the crimes and punishment of a vampire
  • Aldmeri Scouting Efforts - Grand Warlord Sorcalin
  • Alduin is Real - Thromgar Iron-Head
    One Nord's view of the Alduin/Akatosh dichotomy.
  • Aleris the Shroud - Anonymous
    A description of a champion
  • Aleswell Eviction Notice - Anonymous
  • Alethius's Notes - Alethius
    Complaint about overzealous researchers.
  • All About Echatere - Glimburr gro-Shatul
    Raising Echaterre without your children hating you.
  • All About Giants - Bonorion the Wanderer
    Observations on Giants
  • All Alone - Anonymous
  • All Employees Must Read! - Indaryn
    Concerns a practical joke.
  • All Fear Agrakh - Anonymous
    Proclamation from the Wood Orcs to the Bosmer
  • All For the Better - Meline
  • All Our Hopes Dashed - Anonymous
  • Almalexia and the Mudcrab - Anonymous
    A fable about accepting help
  • Alone - Anonymous
    An outcast girl finds company
  • Altars of Bone - Anonymous
    Fragmentary instructions for a dark offering
  • Altered Missive - Anonymous
  • Altmer: Heirs of a Noble Lineage - Anonymous
    A decree accompanying several artifacts
  • Altmeri Overseer's Journal - Anonymous
    A sneering view on Goblin slaves
  • Aluvus' Final Notes - Aluvus
    Aluvus' plan to alleviate loneliness
  • Aluvus' Further Notes - Aluvus
    Spared for a dark purpose?
  • Aluvus' Journal - Aluvus
  • Aluvus' Notes - Aluvus
    Aluvus is spared - but why?
  • Alva's Journal - Alva
    The origin of Morthal's vampire problem.
  • Alvada's Journal - Alvada
  • Alval Uvani's Schedule - Anonymous
    The schedule of Alval Uvani, a Dark Brotherhood target.
  • Amantius Allectus' Diary - Amantius Allectus
    The theft of this diary is the objective of the Thieves Guild quest "May The Best Thief Win"
  • Amaund Motierre's Sealed Letter - Amaund Motierre
    Veiled instructions for a series of assassinations to be performed by the Dark Brotherhood.
  • Amber Materials List - Dumag gro-Bonk
    List of materials for creating armor and weapon from Amber.
  • Amberic's Note - Amberic
    Amberic is turned into a Goblin
  • Amethyst Mining in the Alik'r - Ezdwelen al-Rihad
    Where and how to find amethysts in Hammerfell
  • Aminyas' Journal - Aminya
    A negative view of King Jolie
  • Amongst the Draugr - Bernadette Bantien
    Observations on Draugr behavior and ancient Nordic society.
  • An "Invitation" to Discovery - Birer Salen
    The lucky slaves hav been volunteered to test new magical experiments
  • An Accounting of the Elder Scrolls - Quintus Nerevelus
    A Librarian attempts to find information on the number and locations of the Elder Scrolls.
  • An Affair With Death - Mirise Dres
    A Necromancer from the slaver's House recounts the early days
  • An Almanac of Betony - Anonymous
    Celebrating the island's cliffs
  • An Amazing Opportunity - Dobinskal One-Finger
    A thief wants to rob the Iron Orcs near Craglorn.
  • An Ancient Love Letter - Rogano
  • An Ancient Scroll - Anonymous
    An ominous record
  • An Apology for Missing Jewelry - Anonymous
  • An Appology - Wilhem
    Shroudheath Barrow is haunted and bad for business.
  • An Archer's Archive - Sabarid The Seeker
    One marksman's journey to become even better
  • An Artisan's Oasis - Anonymous
    An artistic lesson from Leki
  • An Easy Assignment - Surii
    An assignment to acquire a Goblin's trinket
  • An Egg-citing Discovery - Anonymous
    An over-eager gatherer collects the wrong eggs
  • An Elder Scroll - Anonymous
    If you are not a Moth Priest, do not expect to be able to read this.
  • An Elegantly Penned Letter - Ramina
    A painfully honest parting of ways
  • An Elytra's Life - Karmelle
    An essay about Elytra.
  • An End to Isolation - Anonymous

    A children's story about an elf who finds and egg and thinks it's going to hatch a dragon. It doesn't.
  • The Empty Room - Anonymous
    Excavation report
  • The Epic of the Grey Falcon - Anido Jhone, editor
    A popular joke about a shipwreck survivor.
  • The Ever-Filling Chalice - Anonymous
  • The Everfull Flagon Handbill - Anonymous
    A warning scrawled on a handbill
  • The Everscriven Tome - Anonymous
    A prayer to The One Who Watches
  • The Excavation of Ouze - Anonymous
    Instructions of excavating a haunted location
  • The Exclusionary Mandates - Anonymous
    The basic beliefs of the Alessian Order
  • The Exodus - Waughin Jarth
    This is the story of a young girl named Vralla. When she becomes ill, her parents are told to go to the Mages Guild at Olenveld for help. Vralla gets better in the end, sort of.
  • The Experiment - Sanessalmo
    Playing with the deepest fears and desires of one's co-workers.
  • The Fabricated Fauna of Clockwork - Endilaril
    Information on the mechanical creatures found in Sotha Sil's realm
  • The Faceless - Anonymous
    A dark presence haunts an old Elven ruin
  • The Factotum's Secret Voice - Lector Tidras Dran
    Examination of the Factotum's voice and language patterns, and speculation on their origin
  • The Faerie - Szun Triop
    A book about creatures that never made it into the game.
  • The Falconer's Log - Anonymous
    Weather reports of a ship of the Gold Fleet and its Khajiiti atache
  • The Fall and Rise of Reman's Bluff - Praetor Aemilianus Lector
    An aggregate of information on a failed Imperial fort
  • The Fall of Carac Dena - Anonymous
    Quick text about an Ayleid stronghold in Valenwood
  • The Fall of Queen Nurnhilde - Helgreir Lute-Voice
    A song about the death of Queen Nurhilde, mother of King Jorunn
  • The Fall of Saarthal - Heseph Chirirnis
    A rather ineffectual report on the state of Saarthal's ruins.
  • The Fall of the Usurper - Palaux Illthre
    Another inquiry in political history, this work discusses how the defeat of Camoran the Usurper was arranged by the joint forces of High Rock, led by Dwynnen.
  • The Fall of Trinimac - The Faithless One
    A description of Trinimac's fall from grace
  • The Falmer: A study - Ursa Uthrax
    A history of the Falmer after the fall of the Snow Prince, explaining their state today.
  • The False Revanchism of the Maormer - Hadendril of Skywatch
    A very negative view of the Maormer and their conflict with Summerset
  • The Father's Promise - Anonymous
    A poem to an Argonian hatchling
  • The Favored Daughter of Fadomai - Amun-dro
    Khajiiti myth about Azura and the death of Lorkhan
  • The Fickle Nature of Mudcrabs - Anonymous
    Notes on Mudcrab behavior
  • The Fires Guide the Way - Anonymous
    Note with an important clue
  • The Fires of Truth - Anonymous
    Show your devotion to the Divines
  • The Firmament - Ffoulke
    A document about all the constellations.
  • The First Charter - Anonymous
  • The First Day - Anonymous
    A fledgling Razor Master receives a Dagger.
  • The First of the Letters - Anonymous
    A love letter
  • The First Scroll of Baan Dar - Arkan
    A story about mysterious Baan Dar, the Bandit God. In the game there are shrines devoted to him.
  • The First Scroll of Baan Dar (Exerpt) - Yanabir-ja, loyal follower of the Boaster
    Exerpt from the exploits of the legendary bandit god
  • The Firsthold Revolt - Maveus Cie
    The continuing story of Morgiah, scheming princess of Wayrest, who you do a quest for in Daggerfall. After making her deal with the King of Worms, Morgiah moved to Summerset Isle. The rest is contained in this book.
  • The Five Far Stars - Anonymous
    An ashlander song.
  • The Five Points of the Star - Sigillah Parate
    The tenents of faith in Azura
  • The Five Songs of King Wulfharth - Anonymous
    Summaries of the Five Songs. Contains a unique take on the Battle at Red Mountain, among other things.
  • The Five Tenets - Anonymous
    The five rules of the Dark Brotherhood.
  • The Flames of the Fetcherfly - Zabia-ko
    A scholar stumbles on a nest full of these dangerous insects
  • The Flask of Lillandril Maps - Anonymous
    Various maps of the fabled Flask of Lillandril.
  • The Flight of Gryphons - Anonymous
    How the Altmer tamed the gryphon
  • The Flourishing of Elinhir - Garold Farfly
    An account of the famous city of mages
  • The Folly of Isolation - Anonymous
    A satirical play lambasting the political factions
  • The Font Aequiius - Kinlord Astanamo
    Presenting a chalice that lets one control water
  • The Forest Dark - Joseryne Madier
  • The Fort Sphinxmoth Ruins - Calantius of Skingrad
    A History of this 2nd Empire fort
  • The Founding of Bloodtoil - Anonymous
    A Bosmeri village is reclaimed from Orcish squatters
  • The Founding of Southpoint - Provincial Office of Governor Zantonius
    A propaganda history of Southpoint and its founder, Governor Zantonius
  • The Founding of Zuuk - Ashalaku, Black Marsh
    Brief history of the town founded by this famous historical figure
  • The Four Abominations - Vinicius Imbrex
    Descriptions of the beasts abhored by Stendarr
  • The Four Suitors of Benitah - Jole Yolivess
    The tale of how a man wins the heart of a woman.
  • The Four Totems of Volkygge - Anonymous
    A riddle whose answer is the solution to a puzzle.
  • The Friend of All Mortals - The Resolute Templar of Ska'vyn
    Short text about Stendarr and his prevalence across Tamriel
  • The Frostfall Coup - Tandemen
    A brief history of how Euraxia came to rule northern Elsweyr, as well as an overview of the current political situation
  • The Fruit and the Stone - Anonymous
    The Hist produce a Zaht Stone to protect their subject
  • The Furstock Song - Anonymous
  • The Gambler's Art - Anonymous

  • The Glory of the Hunt - Wyress Strigidae
  • The Gold Ribbon of Merrit - Ampyrian Brum
    An amusing story of two friends, one a self-centered buffoon and the other a quiet but gifted warrior, reuniting for some idle archery.

    How to collect various dragon fluids
  • The Gorge - Anonymous
  • The Gorge - Anonymous

    Please donate your culturally significant loot to this museum

  • The Lie We Tell Ourselves - Anonymous
    A Dark Brotherhood member's frustration and their relationship with the Night Mother
  • The Light and The Dark - Irek Unterge
    This work is the precursor to all the theology that surfaced in and after TES:Redguard. It mentions the struggle of the two entities, Order and Chaos, it also mentions et'Ada... In other words, The Monomyth and its aspects evolved from this book.
  • The Lightless Oubliette - Anonymous
    Kynbriefing for the Lightless Oubliette
  • The Lion Guard Wants You! - Anonymous
    Recruitment pamphlet promising glory and adventure
  • The Little Alkosh's Log - Anonymous
    The log of a Khajiiti sailor
  • The Liturgy of Affliction - Vexis Velruan, Anias Gael (scribe)
    Memoirs of Vexis Velruan, the man who explore the destruction fanatically by sacrificing anything, including his own body. A typical man who had been touched by Sheogorath aspect of Mania.
  • The Lives of Njabi - Anonymous
  • The Living Flesh - Reezal-Jul
    A dark creation lives
  • The Living Gods - Durillis the Theologian
    A theological examination of the Dunmer Tribunal
  • The Living Woods - Anonymous
    An essay about Gnarl.
  • The Llodos Plague - Alchemist Merdyndril
    A sinister plot to engineer a pandemic
  • The Locked Room - Porbert Lyttumly
    Yana is a locksmithing student who is interested in the theory and technique of the craft more than the practical considerations of it. Arthcamu is her impatient, pragmatic, and cruel instructor. By the end of the story, one of their deaths is imminent!
  • The Lost Communion - Anonymous
    An Argonian rekindles his connection to the Hist
  • The Lost Fort Faleria - Anonymous
    The tale of a Cyrodiilic noble whose love of an elven woman drives him to madness

  • The Lost Warrior - Anonymous

    The author aims to convince mother about zombies

    A former thug tells of a particularly brutal assignment from the Tong, in hopes of scaring away those who thought to join
  • The Lusty Argonian Footman, Volume 1 - Anonymous

    A brief introduction to how Sotha Sil removed his memories to make way for divinity
  • The Memory Stone - Makela Leki
    Personal diary of Leki, one of the Redguard warrior-saints. Connects tightly to Destri Melarg's cycle about Sword-Singers. Leki (or, rather, her image) played a major role in TES: Redguard.

    Working in a mine is hard and thankless work

    A theology book that contains some of the most common creation myths.

    A theology book that contains some of the most common creation myths.

  • The Pledge of Vigilance - Anonymous
    Take these pledges, as the Stars command.
  • The Poison Song - Bristin Xel
    A fascinating epic set in the aftermath of the War with the Dwemer and House Dagoth. A story of secrets, betrayal, survival, love, incest and redmeption, this is one you can't miss.
  • The Posting of the Hunt - Anonymous
    An instruction note of the Ritual of the Innocent Quarry, also called the Wild Hunt (not to be confused with the Bosmer ritual).
  • The Prayers of Baranat - Anonymous
    A story about the adventure of very faithful man, in his quest to release the kidnapped lady. Reading this will increases hand-to-hand skill.
  • The Predecessors - Yngvar the Wanderer
    Essay about the ruins of Shivering Isles. Theorizes about a cataclysm that occurs every a thousand years, the Greymarch.
  • The Pretension of High Elf Jewelry - Elredith
    A pamphlet exhausting the beauty of Altmeri jewelry
  • The Price of Praxis - Ceruval Rolumaril
    Autobiography of an outcast (apraxic) Altmer, and his quest to return to society
  • The Primate: Before the Light - Midara Salviticus
    The early days of Anvil's Primate Artorius
  • The Primate: Finding Faith - Midara Salviticus
    The young Artorius Ancrus begins his religious training
  • The Primate: Rise to Glory - Midara Salviticus
    The future Primate performs a miracle
  • The Prison Must Fall - Anonymous
  • The Prophet Arden-Sul - Anonymous
    Story about the prophet Arden-Sul, in mania and dementia points of view.
  • The Proving Festival - Laije-Palak Rulician
    A personal description of an Akaviri festival by a citizen of Hakoshae shortly after its founding
  • The Prowler's Log - Anonymous
    The log of the Prowler
  • The Psijic Order - Vrithilin

  • The Quiet Room - Anonymous

    Ranev gains the six celestial blessings
  • The Ravings of Fenroy - Fenroy
    A book of 'poems'.
  • The Reachmen are Coming! - Anonymous
  • The Real Barenziah - Plitinius Mero (uncredited)
    A classic! The story of Barenziah, her life, and her involvement in the politics of Tamriel. Pretty raunchy in places.
  • The Real Barenziah (Complete) - Plitinius Mero (uncredited)
    A must read! Very long. Pretty raunchy in some places. Contains a prehistory to the plot of TES:Arena. Features Tiber Septim.
  • The Real Investigator Vale? - Adandora
    Biography of and interview with Arabelle Davaux, a former spy, warrior, and detective, and perhaps the author of the Investigator Vale novels
  • The Real Nerevar - Anonymous
    Another book about Nerevar, this time the Telvanni version.

  • The Sage - Aegrothius Goth
    A story about a great mage who spent numerous years learning and researching, finally settled in the Kurallian mountains in High Rock and started teaching younger Mages. Looks like this story was initially meant as a gameplay hint, but I don't know about anything of the like in the game.
